About.title: About Me
About.description: For the past three years, I have been working as a frontend developer.

experience.title: Indra
experience.achievedObjective: Currently, I am developing web and mobile components for the BBVA bank platform.

experience.title: My own
experience.achievedObjective: I am a freelance web developer with over 5 years of experience in developing websites and web applications.
experience.objectiveResult: I am a dedicated and responsible professional who always strives to exceed the expectations of my clients. I am always willing to learn new technologies and techniques to provide the best possible service.

experience.title: Endava
experience.achievedObjective: Achieved objective: Together with my team, we created a web application for customer self-management for the Coign credit card, a fintech company in the United States.
experience.objectiveResult: Objective result: The customer self-management application has managed to significantly reduce customer management costs, allowing the company to invest more money in marketing.

experience.title: Sophos Solutions
experience.achievedObjective: Achieved objective: Together with my team, we created a web application specialized in user acquisition.
experience.objectiveResult: Objective result: It allows you to acquire new customers 24/7 with a lower cost of acquisition per customer.

experience.title: Universidad del Rosario
experience.achievedObjective: Achieved objective: Change the design and improve the performance of all university websites.
experience.objectiveResult: Objective result: The branding was improved and as a result, more people are interested in filling out the enrollment forms.

Portfolio.title: Portfolio
Portfolio.description: My passion lies in bringing captivating and user-friendly digital experiences to life. As a frontend developer, I focus on crafting interactive and responsive interfaces that blend technical prowess with compelling design. My portfolio reflects my commitment to excellence in web development, showcasing projects where creativity meets functionality to deliver memorable web experiences. From implementing responsive designs to optimizing performance, my goal is to leverage the latest technologies and standards to drive impactful and immersive projects that delight users and effectively solve challenges.
